value.label: 1 - quick review; send through DocuSign/ under 30 minutes

value.fullName: 2 - Nevro Template, Minor Changes. Other Party Template, No Changes
value.label: 2 - a few rounds of short emails/ under 2 hours

value.fullName: 3 - Nevro Template, Moderate Changes. Other Party Template, Minor Changes
value.label: 3 - expected amount of time for the type of agreement/ 3-5 hours

value.fullName: 4 - Nevro Template, Major Changes. Other Party Template, Moderate Changes
value.label: 4 - involvement of other department approvals, multiple rounds of emails/ 5-10 hours
5 - including 4 above, plus multiple rounds of redlines, multiple phone calls/ 10 or more hours
